description:
GParted 1.7 open-source partition editor is now available for download with experimental support for the Bcachefs file system. GParted Live 1.7 is also out with Linux kernel 6.12 LTS.

The post GParted Live 1.7 Launches with Experimental Bcachefs Support, Linux 6.12 LTS appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: GParted Live 1.7 Launches with Experimental Bcachefs Support, Linux 6.12 LTS
